attributes.action: Allow pinkteddyx64 to become a moderator on the Digital Spy forums
attributes.additional_details: Now, I implore the Minister to get involved in this suggestion and put it to the owners of the Digital Spy Forums that this guy, pinkteddyx64 should not only be allowed back on the Digital Spy forums again, but by law be also made a moderator on the Digital Spy forums too, and what a fine moderator I think that he will make!
